entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023
